overview: Girlfriends Films have exciting exchanges that will drive wild even the most subdued of thoughts! In the third scene, Julia Ann and her girlfriend Veronica Avluv wake up next to each other. A simple conversation turned into an entire sex-escapade of finger fucking, cunnilingus, scissoring and lots of other touches of tenderness. Women Seeking Women Volume 74 is another edition to the four time AVN Award Winner Best Selling Girl Series.
tagline: Restless hearts searching for that one perfect woman
title: Women Seeking Women 74
